title: Chapter V - New York State Bridge Authority
content:
Chapter V - New York State Bridge Authority

State Regulations

Part 200 - General Provisions (§ 200.1 to 200.8)

Part 201 - Toll Rules And Rates (§ 201.1 to 201.8)

Part 202 - Prohibited Operators And Vehicles (§ 202.1 to 202.6 to 202.10)

Part 203 - Regulation Of Traffic (§ 203.1 to 203.13)

Part 204 - Prohibited Conduct (§ 204.0 to 204.18)

Part 205 - Bicycle And Pedestrian Access (§ 205.1 to 205.5)

Part 206 - Public Access To Records Of The New York State Bridge Authority Pursuant To The Freedom Of Information Law (§ 206.1 to 206.8)

Part 207 - Prompt Payment Policy (§ 207.1 to 207.5)

Part 208 - Accommodation Plan For The Longitudinal Use Of Bridge Authority Right-of-way By Utilities (§ 208.1 to 208.5)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
